object.name: sendMessageDraft
object.description: Use this method to stream a partial message to a user while the message is being generated; supported only for bots with forum topic mode enabled. Returns True on success.
object.html_description: Use this method to stream a partial message to a user while the message is being generated; supported only for bots with forum topic mode enabled. Returns True on success.
object.rst_description: Use this method to stream a partial message to a user while the message is being generated; supported only for bots with forum topic mode enabled. Returns :code:`True` on success.

annotations.description: Unique identifier for the target private chat
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier for the target private chat
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for the target private chat
annotations.name: chat_id

annotations.description: Unique identifier for the target message thread
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier for the target message thread
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for the target message thread
annotations.name: message_thread_id

annotations.description: Unique identifier of the message draft; must be non-zero. Changes of drafts with the same identifier are animated
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier of the message draft; must be non-zero. Changes of drafts with the same identifier are animated
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier of the message draft; must be non-zero. Changes of drafts with the same identifier are animated
annotations.name: draft_id

annotations.description: Text of the message to be sent, 1-4096 characters after entities parsing
annotations.html_description: Text of the message to be sent, 1-4096 characters after entities parsing
annotations.rst_description: Text of the message to be sent, 1-4096 characters after entities parsing
annotations.name: text

annotations.description: Mode for parsing entities in the message text. See formatting options for more details.
annotations.html_description: Mode for parsing entities in the message text. See formatting options for more details.
annotations.rst_description: Mode for parsing entities in the message text. See `formatting options <https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#formatting-options>`_ for more details.
annotations.name: parse_mode

annotations.description: A JSON-serialized list of special entities that appear in message text, which can be specified instead of parse_mode
annotations.html_description: A JSON-serialized list of special entities that appear in message text, which can be specified instead of parse_mode
annotations.rst_description: A JSON-serialized list of special entities that appear in message text, which can be specified instead of *parse_mode*
annotations.name: entities
